CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y software-properties-common &&     echo oracle-java8-installer shared/accepted-oracle-license-v1-1 select true | debconf-set-selections &&     add-apt-repository -y ppa:webupd8team/java &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y oracle-java8-installer &&     rm -rf /var/cache/oracle-jdk8-installer
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd / &&     wget -q "http://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/$MAVEN_VERSION/binaries/apache-maven-$MAVEN_VERSION-bin.tar.gz" -O - | tar xvzf - &&     mv /apache-maven-$MAVEN_VERSION /usr/share/maven &&     ln -s /usr/share/maven/bin/mvn /usr/bin/mvn
Commands.Name: run
